job_to_be_done.task: Create and manage fillable forms for onboarding and compliance.

extracted_sections.section_title: Submit 2. Choose from the options, or provide details in the text box. Then select
Did you enter the email addresses of clients, agents, and other

subsection_analysis.refined_text:
Interactive forms : These contain fields that you can select and fill in. •
Flat forms : These do not have interactive fields. It could be a paper form or PDF that •
hasn’t been optimized for form filling. The Fill & Sign tool automatically detects the
form fields like text fields, comb fields, checkboxes, and radio buttons. You can
manually add text and other symbols anywhere on the form using the Fill & Sign tool if
required.
You can complete the forms by entering information and adding your signatures. Acrobat
also allows you to send your completed forms to others and securely save them in Adobe
cloud storage.
interactive An form contains fields that you can select or fill in.

Send in Bulk 1. Select the tool as explained earlier. The Send in bulk file upload page
is displayed.
Add a file 2. :
Upload (by search or drag-and-drop) the primary file that you are using to build
your agreement template.
Select a file The selector on the right of the button allows you to choose from the
source where the file resides. The default is your local system.
Once a file is selected, the configuration page loads.
Add participants 3. :
1. List the participants required.
Sign The action is assigned by default. •
Sign The action allows the participant to enter field data and sign the •
agreement.
Up to 50 participants are supported. •
Each participant listed receives their own agreement. •
2. Enter recipient email addresses followed by commas, or copy and paste a list of
email addresses into the Email field.
3. Configure participant authentication by clicking the key icon to the right of the
participant.
Email is the default authentication method for confirming the identity of each •
participant and is sufficient to obtain a legal signature in most cases.
Password authentication can be added to increase security. When configured, the participant
must enter the password before they can interact with the agreement.
4. . (Optional) Add yourself and/or CC'd parties
Add me Click to add yourself as a counter signer. •
Select the applicable options to report content

•
stakeholders?
Customize Your Message
•
Have you added a personal touch to the subject and message
•
fields, highlighting key property details?
Create and Share the Link
•
Did you generate a shareable link and copy it for distribution?
•

•

•
chosen platform?
Follow Up
•
Are you tracking who has accessed the document and
•
following up with clients for feedback or next steps?
Professional Tip: Highlight Key Details
Make sure to emphasize important property details in your message to
capture your clients' attention.
